    Install and run app

    install-and-run-app.Rmd

    Install NEespShiny package

    remotes::install_github("NOAA-EDAB/NEespShiny")
#> Using github PAT from envvar GITHUB_PAT
#> Downloading GitHub repo NOAA-EDAB/NEespShiny@HEAD
#> 
#>   
   checking for file ‘/tmp/Rtmpt7mj6A/remotes31c51aebf204/NOAA-EDAB-NEespShiny-dca4daf/DESCRIPTION’ ...
  
✔  checking for file ‘/tmp/Rtmpt7mj6A/remotes31c51aebf204/NOAA-EDAB-NEespShiny-dca4daf/DESCRIPTION’
#> 
  
─  preparing ‘NEespShiny’:
#> 
  
   checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ...
  
✔  checking DESCRIPTION meta-information
#> 
  
─  checking for LF line-endings in source and make files and shell scripts
#> 
  
─  checking for empty or unneeded directories
#> 
  
─  building ‘NEespShiny_0.0.0.9000.tar.gz’
#> 
  
   
#> 
#> Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpEQgYSX/temp_libpath31602bd14050'
#> (as 'lib' is unspecified)

    Run NEespShiny package

    NEespShiny::run_NEesp()
#> Loading required package: shiny
#> 
#> Listening on http://127.0.0.1:8630

    Troubleshooting

    • Override package installation errors from warnings:
    Sys.setenv(R_REMOTES_NO_ERRORS_FROM_WARNINGS="true")
    • Explicitly install NEesp:
    remotes::install_github("NOAA-EDAB/NEesp")
